title: Nancy Pelosi Announced An Impeachment Inquiry In President Trump And Twitter Had Jokes
text:
Related:

A Wave Machine Created A Terrifying Tsunami That Injured Dozens Of Swimmers

Jessica Alba Hacked: Twitter Account Flooded With Racist and Homophobic Messages

'Double Shot at Love' Star Pauly D's Private Texts Exposed By Nikki Hall: 'I Love You'

'Big Little Lies' Star Scores Big-Time Contract for Season 2

'Love Island' Star Mike Thalassitis Dead at 26

Nancy Pelosi's Announcement

On Tuesday afternoon, House Speaker Nancy Pelosi launched a formal impeachment inquiry against President Donald Trump. While a call for impeachment was first mentioned two and a half years ago, the news that Trump pressured the Ukrainian president to find dirt on former Vice President Joe Biden's family was the final straw that pushed Pelosi into action.

Twitter Had Jokes Ready Immediately

In the wake of this serious news, Twitter did what Twitter does best: make jokes. Seriously, the memes are on point. Twitter users have been waiting for this moment for literal years, and they were not going to throw away their shot.

Some Thought It Was About Time

Some users pointed out that this action was long overdue, including Jeopardy! legend Ken Jennings.

Did They Have These Waiting In Their Drafts

Others pointed out that Pelosi would surely show up in Trump's daily Twitter rants today. They were correct.

It's Easier To Make Jokes Than Be Serious

This move surely indicates that a very ugly political period is at hand, but jokes are easier for now. We can deal with the fallout in the morning.

"Impeachment Fever Fall"

Perhaps Buzzfeed News said it best: Goodbye Hot Girl Summer, Hello Impeachment Fever Fall.
description: Twitter has been waiting for this moment.
